attributes.comment:
I understand you are considering raising fees for the I600a.

We are adopting through China and as you are probably aware, the referals are
coming very slowly.We have paid for finger printing and I171a once already
and will have to do it again - and possibly a third time. When the I600a
expires, our re-submission is regarded as brand new and we have to provide all
the same documents....again. We have to pay all the same fees.....again.

I understand you need to raise fees to cover the work that you do. However,
since we are re-submitting, is there any way we can get a break on our costs?
You've already done all the work already - why 'reinvent the wheel', so to
speak. Keep some info in the system....see if it has changed....and if it
hasn't - give us a new form at a reduced cost.

Thank you for your consideration.

Susan Binzel
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Susan Binzel
